thread.title: Soldiers foil suicide attack at Nigeria army base
thread.title_full: Soldiers foil suicide attack at Nigeria army base | News24

author: news24.com
title: Soldiers foil suicide attack at Nigeria army base
text:
Kano - Nigerian soldiers shot dead a suspected suicide bomber outside a military base in the northeast on Sunday, detonating explosives concealed in her handbag, a civilian vigilante and a military source told AFP.
The target was thought to be the Maimalari army barracks - the main military base in Maiduguri, which has been hit repeatedly in recent months by Boko Haram Islamists.
"Soldiers at Maimalari army barracks this morning [Sunday] foiled a suicide attack by a female bomber," said Babakura Kolo, from the civilian volunteer force assisting troops against the rebels.
The woman approached the barracks around 07:00 (06:00 GMT) and headed towards the gates, he said. Military guards at the gates shouted at her to stop for security checks but she ignored them and continued walking towards the gates, he added.
